subject: Re: New Donations page for website

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

Please let me know when it is live as I have a button that I want to put on rotation on the homepage directing people to the page.

Many thanks

Jaqui

Hi Jaqui,

Confirming these changes have now been made.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli
Heath Maguire changed the customer to Jaqui Herman

full_threads.body:
Hi Jaqui,

Sure, we will work on this and get back to you once it's ready to review.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


On 12 Sep 2018, at 9:59 am, Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath

Thanks for this. Looks great. Just a few small changes

· Can you remove the top heading that says 'Donation Details'
· Can you change 'Price' to 'Donation Amount'
· Can you change the last sentence to be 'Your donation to Wolper Jewish Hospital is an allowable deduction for income tax.'

Happy for it to go live once these changes are made. Please advise.

Many thanks
Jaqui

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 6 September 2018 12:21 PM
To: Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au>
Cc: Michelle Stockley <MichelleStockley@wolper.com.au>
Subject: Re: New Donations page for website

Hi Jaqui,

Here is the donation page: https://wolper.com.au/donation/ for you to review.

I just did a $1 test as well which the friends@ email address would have received a notification email - please let me know if you want these going somewhere else?

For the person donating, they receive an email very similar to the membership one, please cross check this also.

Once you are ready for this to go live, we will add a button to the Support Us page.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

On 5 Sep 2018, at 2:18 pm, Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au> wrote:

Great, thanks Heath.
One other thing I forgot….can you please add include on the page " Donations to Wolper are tax deductible"
From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 5 September 2018 2:14 PM
To: Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au>
Cc: Michelle Stockley <MichelleStockley@wolper.com.au>
Subject: Re: New Donations page for website
Hi Jaqui,
Ok sure, leave it with me. We should be able to do this within your 2 included hours this month as we can use a lot of the code from the membership form.
I'll have an update later in the week.
Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

On 5 Sep 2018, at 2:11 pm, Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au> wrote:
Hi Heath
We would like to add a donation page to our website.
In https://wolper.com.au/about-us/support-us/ where we say "Make a one off tax deductable donation" can you link to this to the new donation page.
On the donation page itself can you please have the text below, followed by a payment form. The payment form just needs: Title, First Name, Surname, Address, Phone, Email, Donation amount, Would you like your donation to remain anonymous? (this field can be left blank), Would you like someone to contact you regarding making a bequest in your will? (this field can be left blank). Besides the last 2 fields all the others are mandatory.
Text for page
Everyone is welcome at Wolper Jewish Hospital - we are a not for profit hospital sponsored by the NSW Jewish community that stays true to our founding principles of dignity, compassion and outstanding quality of care.
Because we don't receive funds from any government sources we rely solely on patient fees, donations and bequests from benefactors.
Wolper could not operate without help from good friends like you. Each donation goes to help Wolper meet the community's healthcare needs both within and outside the Hospital. Every donation or gift, whether large or small, makes a real difference to people's lives and is an important way of demonstrating your support for the hospital
Many thanks
Jaqui
<image004.png>

Jaqui Herman
Operations Assistant
Wolper Jewish Hospital
E: jaquiherman@wolper.com.au 8 Trelawney Street
T: 02 8324 2237 F: 02 9327 5973 Woollahra NSW 2025
